schema.description: 建立部署包版本的应用ID
用于建立部署包版本的资源包

Message.description: 响应消息，若成功请求为success。

PackageSource.description: 部署包资源位置，用于建立部署包版本的资源。

Code.description: 响应代码，若成功请求为OK。

400.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating an application version. The version name already exists. Please use a different name and try again.
The specified OSS path is invalid. For more information about OSS path, see oss://webx-demo/directory/file.json

403.errorMessage: The specified resource does not exist or it does not belong to this Alibaba Cloud account.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": "OK", "Message": "success", "RequestId": "14A65FB3-DFD6-4D9A-83EA-9259C2D*****", "PkgVersion": { "AppName": "app1", "UpdateTime": 1564388159130, "PkgVersionLabel": "version-demo-tmc-1.5", "CreateTime": 1564388159130, "AppId": "wa-5d3eaae92977ca5251e*****", "PackageSource": "oss://target-url/webx/webx-quickstart-tomcat-0.1.0-SNAPSHOT.war", "PkgVersionId": "wp-5d3eab3f2977ca5251e*****", "PkgVersionDescription": "This is a package" } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" success 257C2FA9-3316-4BCB-9DB7-219A7A0***** This is a package. 1562246822377 wa-5d1d9d8c85c7f86e2ef***** 1562246822377 version-demo-tmc-1.4 wp-5d244f33f314934e2ab***** OK ","errorExample":""}]
title: 创建一个部署包版本
summary: 调用CreatePkgVersion创建一个部署包版本。
